metadata.name: HOPE
metadata.description:
Artist - Dan Woo (BanthaFodderDan)  
Timed Open Edition

In tough times we need support, no matter how strong we are individually there is always a way to weather the difficult times with more success with the help of others. Through the tough times there are brighter days - it's this hope of seeing those brighter times that help us to gain strength to keep going.

This shot was taken back on a brisk day in April 2022. The Hope statue is located at the corner of W 53rd St + 7th Ave in Midtown Manhattan. It was created by artist Robert Indiana who also created his LOVE series of art which this is related to.

This free claim is minted in hopes to lift the vibes of the space during this difficult time.
